name: Kidron
tag_list: boutique-investment-bank, technology, media, telecom, consumer-goods, financial-services
overview:
Kidron Corporate Advisors LLC is a full service boutique investment bank specializing in cross-border emerging growth companies in the following markets: technology and media, telecom, consumer goods and financial services. They serve our clients with comprehensive investment banking, mergers and acquisitions advisory, and management and strategic advisory services.

The strength is building upon the unique attributes of each of clients. They leverage their strengths and identify opportunities by drawing on own multi-disciplinary experience and executing with precision.

The strategic advisory group is unparalleled in experience. The team has a proven track record of successfully building businesses and team members have substantial operating experience, serving as CEO or CFO with companies in technology and media, telecom, consumer products and financial services.

The focus is serving client companies throughout the life of their business.
